name: HKWorkoutSession
desc: A session that tracks the user’s workout on Apple Watch.

items.name: init(healthStore: HKHealthStore, configuration: HKWorkoutConfiguration)
items.desc: Returns a newly instantiated workout session with an associated workout builder.

items.name: protocol HKWorkoutSessionDelegate
items.desc: The session delegate protocol defines an interface for receiving notifications about errors and changes in the workout session’s state.

items.name: func associatedWorkoutBuilder() -> HKLiveWorkoutBuilder
items.desc: Returns the live workout builder associated with the workout session.

items.name: func startActivity(with: Date?)
items.desc: Starts the workout session activity, and sets the start date.

items.name: func stopActivity(with: Date?)
items.desc: Stops the workout session activity, and sets the end date.

items.name: var endDate: Date?
items.desc: The ending time and date for this workout session.

items.name: var startDate: Date?
items.desc: The starting time and date for this workout session.

items.name: var workoutConfiguration: HKWorkoutConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration object that describes this workout.
